resources.string: Username should contain letters, digits, \'.\' and \'_\' and be 8–20 characters long!
Password should have 8–30 characters, upper and lowercase, 1 special character and min 1 number
Email should be a valid one!
Number should start with 07 and have 10 digits!

\ \ \ \ Allbank is a mobile fintech that helps the user manage its banking accounts in an easier manner. The application unifies all the user\'s bank accounts into a single one, making it easier to manage payments, get detailed and easily customizable statistics of the transactions. \n\ \ \ \ The project is a bachelor\'s degree final project that aims to integrate the banking APIs so that the user experience is maximized. Application\'s top features include synchronizing all the banking accounts from different banks into one single application, providing detailed statistics about income and expenses which can be easily customized based on your needs and easy saving on the payments, making it easier for the user to control the transactions.

\ \ \ \ Your privacy is important to us, so that\'s why we don\'t store any sensitive data on our servers (for example bank\'s account iban, currency or details about its transactions). \n\ \ \ \ By using this application, you consent to the fact that Allbank is an authorized third-party provider that may use your data. Only the authorized requests are passed further to the banking servers and the application CANNOT itself behave on its own.
